summary.p:
The bundle (35-3227 palm leaf manuscript) has two different texts in telugu script. The title and author of both texts are not indicated anywhere in the manuscript. But, the first text contains the śabdakhaṇḍa of the Tattvacintāmaṇi of Gaṅgeśopādhyāya. The śabdakhaṇḍa has many sub divisions, of which titles are mentioned for a few in the left corner of the manuscript. For example:
4th folio: jaranmīmāmsakapakṣaḥ,
8th folio: Prābhākara siddhāntaḥ,
11th folio: ākānkṣāvādaḥ,
16th folio: padādhyāhāraḥ,
18th folio: tātparyavādaḥ
19th folio: āsattivādaḥ
34th folio: Ucchannaśākhāvādaḥ.
The manuscript has the complete text of the śabdakhaṇḍa in 55 folios.

The second text has 1-16 folios. It is an untitled text which appears like a Nyāya text. It seems to be a commentary on the Śaktivāda of the Tattvacintāmaṇi. He established the Naiyāyika's view, rejecting the Mīmāṃsaka's view.

msItem.title: Tattvacintāmaṇi - Śabdakhaṇḍa
msItem.author: Gaṅgeśopādhyāya
msItem.incipit: atha śabdo nirūpyate | prayogahetubhūtārthatattvajñānajanyaḥ śabdaḥ pramāṇaṃ |
msItem.explicit: śrāddhādi | phalaśruteḥ kāmyaṃ akaraṇe prāyaścittaśruteś ca niyatakartavyatākaṃ

msItem.title: Śaktivāda commentary
msItem.incipit:
nanv ārthavādikaṃ kvacit phalam ity asaṃgataṃ arthavādānāṃ siddhārthaparatayā prāmāṇyābhāvāt_ kāryānvita eva padānāṃ śaktyavadhānāt_ tathā hi vṛttivad iti śābdatvaṃ
kāryān anvitaviṣayakavṛttena vā vidhiśo nirṇāyikānāṃ niṣedhād iti
msItem.explicit:
vastu
tas tu jātiviśeṣavato ghaṭāder avayavasaṃyogarūpākṛtiḥ ghaṭapadaśakyeti maṇikārā-bhipretārthaḥ | ata eva ākṛteḥ śakyatve pṛthivipadaśravaṇādipadādau
anugatākṛter abhāvāt kathaṃ śaktir ity api dūṣaṇaṃ parāstam | sarvatrākṛteḥ śakyatvānabhidhānena uktadoṣāsaṃbhavāt ghaṭādipadaśakyatāvacchedakaṃ tu saṃsthānaviśeṣasamānā
dhikaraṇaghaṭatvaṃ na tu saṃsthānam | ghaṭatvaṃ ca pratyekaṃ nāpravṛttinimittakatvena nānārthatāpātāt | na ca niyāmakābhāvena ghaṭatvasamānādhikaraṇapadasthā
navatvam astv iti vācyam | ghaṭatvasya ghaṭaviśeṣasya sākṣāt saṃbandhasyaiva vinigamakatvāt | evaṃ piṣṭakamayyo gāvaḥ ity atra lakṣaṇā yujyate gavām avayavasaṃyo
garūpākṛtir evoktarītyā gopadaśakyatvāt tasya ca piṣṭake abhāvāt | ata eva piṣṭakasaṃyogaviśeṣāśakyatvād iti maṇir api | tasmāt jātiviśeṣa
vato vayavasaṃyogaḥ śakya ity eva jyāya iti pratibhāti | jātiviśeṣavad iti dṛṣṭāntatāyāṃ vatir iti kecit | evaṃ ca jātyākṛtivyaktānāṃ pratyekaṃ śakyatvam i
ti bhramastyājyaḥ | anantaśaktyāpatteḥ | samūhālambanasyāpy āpatteś ca | kiṃ tu jātyākṛtiviśiṣṭe ekaiva śaktiḥ | ata eva paramarṣiḥ bhagavān sakalatantrārthavettā vyaktyākṛtijātyoḥ pa
dārthaḥ ity ekavacanāntarbhāvena sūcayanto vānā sūtrayed iti saṃkṣepaḥ |
